atomic_tests.name: Add Federation to Azure AD
atomic_tests.description:
Add a new federated domain to Azure AD using PowerShell.
The malicious domain to be federated must be configured beforehand (outside of the scope of this test):
    1. Open Azure Portal
    2. Add a new "custom domain name"
    3. Verify the domain by following instructions (i.e. create the requested DNS record)

executor.name: powershell

azure_username.description: Username of a privileged Azure AD account such as External Identity Provider Administrator or Global Administrator roles

dependencies.description: AzureAD and AADInternals Powershell modules must be installed.
